div.small: Helping people and communities achieve optimum physical, mental and social well-being

button.class: btn btn-default btn-block hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl

br.p:
"How to protect us from COVID-19?" (Spanish video with English subtitles)
https://govstatus.egov.com/OR-OHA-COVID-19
It's allergy season in Oregon, and your symptoms might be similar to those you hear about with COVID-19. For more answers to your questions about COVID-19, browse our FAQ page.

div.div: Find information about eligibility, fast-track enrollment and where to find application assistance.
The Oregon Health Plan provides Oregonians with access to coordinated health care. It covers things like regular check-ups, prescriptions, mental health care, addiction treatment and dental care.
Oregon Health Plan members can apply, renew, and manage their information online with the Oregon Eligibility (ONE) system.
Do you need health care coverage? Explore your options.

You may have heard about a federal rule change that could make it harder for some immigrants who use certain public benefits, like Medicaid and food stamps, to get green cards. We know many of you are wondering what this will mean for you.

p.a: Learn more and get information in multiple languages
